Tried. True. Totally Improved.
The new and improved Classic™ shaker gives our tried and true bottle an impressive overhaul with performance-focused innovation and modern style.

Say goodbye to lumpy protein shakes. Our powerful mixing system uses the BlenderBall® wire whisk—found only in BlenderBottle® brand shakers—to deliver smooth protein and nutrition shakes with ease.

What is Tritan?Tritan is a BPA-free plastic — it is not manufactured with bisphenol A (BPA) or other bisphenol compounds, such as bisphenol S (BPS).Tritan is impact-resistant — products can be used without fear of shattering.Tritan is tough — extending the useful life of water bottles and food containers, potentially reducing waste.Tritan has exceptional dishwasher durability — encouraging proper sanitation for greater plastic container safety.

the odor.

gently, and then pour it out after a few minutes. Rinse with clean water.

product_name: Oasis® 500mL Stainless Steel Insulated Drink Bottles
description:
Oasis® 500mL Stainless Steel Insulated Drink Bottles

Description:

The Oasis Stainless Steel double wall insulated Water Bottle in 500mls is a great water bottle for the whole family!
 
They say that you should drink 2 litres of water a day, but unless you sit by a tap with a glass in hand it’s unlikely that you have time to fit that target high up your jam-packed priority list. But staying hydrated shouldn’t be a hassle when you have a water bottle that fits your busy lifestyle to keep watered on the move. And this stainless steel double wall insulated water bottle is the perfect solution.
 
Whether you’re a fan of tea, iced coffee, juice or good old plain water, this 500ml water bottle is the ideal size for your handbag or backpack to stay hydrated on the go. Made from quality durable stainless steel, they are easy and safe to use time after time, for years of your favourite drinks on the go. 
 
The double wall insulation keep contents hot for 12 hours and cold for 24, and makes takeaway drinks redundant to save heaps on your daily budget.
 
These bright bottles are great for kids and adults alike, with an eco-friendly design for a lifetime of lunches. So save money and the earth without compromising on the takeaway treats you love with one of these stylish Oasis bottles

Key Features:
- 18/8 stainless steel – double insulated
- BPA-free plastic lid
- Insulated – twin wall construction
- Stays cold up to 24 hrs / Hot up to 12 hours
- Eco friendly

Add On:
Oasis Pour-Through Stopper With Carry Strap For 350/500ML
SGD$5.90
The Oasis Pour Through Sports Stopper has a convenient carry strap for easy transport. The lid is interchangeable with the regular lid that comes with each Oasis bottle. The pour through sports stopper has a lock to open and close making it leakproof and easy to use. For easy cleaning the section around the grey open button is removable for thorough cleaning, ensure this is screwed back in correctly to avoid leaks.

FEATURES
* Converts your drink bottle
* Silicone rings to prevent leaking
* Carry handle
* Easy press button use

SPECIFICATIONS:
Material: Stainless Steel/Plastic
Colour: Black
BPA free
Compatible with 350ml & 500ml bottles

WEIGHT: 0.3 kg
DIMENSIONS: 6 × 6.5 × 9 cm
